metadata.Title: CVE-2022-4065 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: A vulnerability was found in cbeust testng 7.5.0/7.6.0/7.6.1/7.7.0. It hasbeen declared as critical. Affected by this vulnerability is the functiontestngXmlExistsInJar of the filetestng-core/src/main/java/org/testng/JarFileUtils.java of the component XMLFile Parser. The manipulation leads to path traversal. The attack can belaunched remotely. Upgrading to version 7.5.1 and 7.7.1 is able to addressthis issue. The patch is named 9150736cd2c123a6a3b60e6193630859f9f0422b. Itis recommended to upgrade the affected component. The associated identifierof this vulnerability is VDB-214027.

criterions.comment: testng: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
